price: 78. Usuk Lawcal macfuuzul Yalli qelliseemit bossu iyyeh maaluu kee xaylo-lem isik yuble innaa, hinnak usuk (edde yabna korosta kinnuk) Qhiyaamah ayro Racmaan kinni Rabbih xaqul woh geyuwaamih xagana haysitee?
arabic: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: aṭṭalaʿa al-ghayba ami ittakhadha ʿinda al-raḥmāni ʿahdan
